mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO split_tb ( realname, remark, number, price, apply_date, split_date, create_date, update_date, status, account_id, buy_account_id ) VALUES ( #{realname}, #{remark}, #{number}, #{price}, #{applyDate}, #{splitDate}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{status}, #{accountId}, #{buyAccountId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE split_tb
realname=#{realname},
remark=#{remark},
number=#{number},
price=#{price},
apply_date=#{applyDate},
split_date=#{splitDate},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate},
status=#{status},
account_id=#{accountId},
buy_account_id=#{buyAccountId},
WHERE split_id=#{splitId}
mapper.select: SELECT split_id, realname, remark, number, price, apply_date, split_date, create_date, update_date, status, account_id, buy_account_id FROM split_tb WHERE split_id=#{splitId}
